can you generate a poem?

routes.name: numerical_analysis
utterances: can you solve this equation?
help me with this calculation
perform a statistical analysis on this data
what's the result of this formula?
calculate the average of these numbers
find the median of this dataset
analyze the trends in this data
determine the standard deviation for this dataset
what is the probability of picking one red ball and one blue ball from a jar containing ten red balls and ten blue balls?
how do I calculate the variance of this data?
can you compute the correlation between these variables?
what is the likelihood of this event occurring?
calculate the regression coefficients for this dataset
estimate the confidence interval for this mean
compute the p-value for this hypothesis test

routes.name: navigation
utterances: How do I get to the nearest gas station?
Can you give me directions to the airport?
What is the best route to downtown?
Show me the way to the nearest hospital.
How far is it to the nearest coffee shop?
Which bus should I take to get to the museum?
Can you find a nearby hotel?
How do I get to Main Street?
What is the quickest way to the train station?
Where is the nearest pharmacy?
Tell me how to reach the library.
I need directions to the city center.
What are the travel options to get to the university?
How can I find the nearest park?
Where is the closest grocery store?

routes.name: odoo_erp
utterances: Can you provide a report of all customer invoices issued in the last month?
What are the total payments received, including transaction details, for the specified period?
Provide a report of all vendor bill transactions (paid, unpaid, and adjusted) for the specified period.
How do I access the details of all refunds processed and invoice cancellations with corresponding reasons for the past year?
Can you show me all transactions related to cash discounts applied to customer invoices this month?
What is the total amount of outstanding invoices and an aged receivables analysis for each customer for the specified period?
Provide a breakdown of transactions by payment type (e.g., credit cards, checks) for the specified period.
Can I retrieve a detailed report of all bank reconciliations conducted in the current month?
What is the amount of deferred revenue currently recorded in the system from customer transactions?
Could you provide an overview of all expense transactions recorded for the marketing department?
What is the status of all payment terms associated with customer invoices issued last quarter?
Can I view the total revenue generated from product sales across different regions for the past year?
What are the historical transactions related to invoice cancellations and their corresponding reasons?
Could you provide the transaction history for all payments made to each vendor in the last six months?
Can you provide details of commission earned by each salesperson year to date?
Can you provide details of inventory to be received this month?
